name: Bananas
description: A non-profit child care referral and support agency serving Northern Alameda County.

name: Community Kitchens

description: Supports formerly incarcerated individuals, promotes community healing and policy change.

name: Homies Empowerment
description: Offers programs encouraging community self-sufficiency in East Oakland.

description: Provides health and community services in the Bay Area, including housing-attorney consultations and dental care.

name: East Oakland Youth Development Center
description: Offers GED preparation, counseling, and job opportunities to Oakland youth.

name: Oakland Reach
